subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
Automobile Racing
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon’s team furiously tried to fix a poorly performing car before its driver’s lead in the Chase for the Nextel Cup points race over Jimmie Johnson disappeared Sunday in Atlanta.
snippet: Jeff Gordon’s team furiously tried to fix a poorly performing car before its driver’s lead in the Chase for the Nextel Cup points race over Jimmie Johnson disappeared Sunday in Atlanta.
